attributes.action: ADDITIONAL HELP FOR WORKING SINGLE PEOPLE WHO LIVE ALONE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People who work full time and have no kids get no help from the government.Government states if you are 25 or over the most you need to live on per week is £45.
I have to admit that the council tax benefit helps SLIGHTLY but i currently work two part time jobs covering 10 hour days and work 42 hours a week to pay for ESSENTIALS.. RENT,COUNCIL TAX,HOUSE INSURANCE, TV LICENCE, ELECTRIC, PHONE AND INTERNET(phone line may not be essentual but in this day and age everyone needs a phone). IM/WE ARE DISCRIMINATED BECAUSE ME/WE HAVE  NO PARTNER OR CHILDREN, IS THIS FAIR?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
